choices.name: Choice_K5
choices.choiceText: K5 (First Nations Peoples if English is not their first language)

fields.name: Intake_Created_Text
fields.fieldText:
Intake Created


The intake form has been created. If it needs to be reviewed please refer to the Assessments tab on the case.


Consent reminder: written consent must be obtained and evidence uploaded to the Participant Case before the Initial Assessment can be completed.


Select an appropriate Assessment below to complete that will be followed by an IAR-DST Assessment.

fields.name: Consent
fields.fieldText: Consent to Participate and Collect Personal Information

fields.name: Verbal_Consent_Text
fields.fieldText:
The Participant consents to be a participant in the Social Futures Program. They understand and can withdraw consent at any time. They acknowledge that personal information about me will be captured and stored on a secure Social Futures database.


Verbal consent must be obtained, as a minimum, to complete the Intake process. Check this box to confirm that the Participant has verbally Consented to Participate and for Social Futures to Collect Personal Information.

fields.name: Written_Consent_Text
fields.fieldText: To participate in this program, written consent must be obtained and a scanned copy uploaded to the Participant Case record before the Initial Assessment can be completed. Check this box ONLY if consent has been obtained and a scanned copy of written consent uploaded.

fields.name: Feedback_Consent_Text
fields.fieldText: Consent to be contacted by Social Futures, during or after participation in the program, to be asked to provide feedback.

validationRule.errorMessage: Phone numbers must be 10-13 digits long and only numerical values are accepted. The plus symbol at the beginning is also valid.
Please enter a valid email address or leave this field blank if no email can be provided.
Address must contain at least the City, State and Postal Code.

fields.name: Do_you_identify_as_LGBTIQSB_or_Culturally_and_Linguistically_Diverse
fields.fieldText: Do you identify as LGBTIQSB+ or Culturally and Linguistically Diverse?

fields.name: Do_you_take_any_medication_for_these_conditions
fields.fieldText: Do you take any medication for these conditions?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 40 characters.
Phone numbers must be 10-13 digits long and only numerical values are accepted. The plus symbol at the beginning is also valid.
Please enter a valid email address or leave this field blank if no email can be provided.

fields.name: Home_Environment
fields.fieldText: What are your current living or home arrangements?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 10000 characters.

fields.name: Work_other_other_commitments
fields.fieldText: What is your current studying, working or volunteering situation?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 10000 characters.

fields.name: Receiving_an_Income_Source
fields.fieldText: Are you receiving any money from wages, benefits or elsewhere?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 10000 characters.

fields.name: Support_Network
fields.fieldText: Do you have people you rely on in your family, friendships, or community?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 10000 characters.

fields.name: Activities_in_Free_Time
fields.fieldText: What do you enjoy doing in your free time?

fields.name: What_kind_of_support
fields.fieldText: What current formal supports do you have in place from other providers?

fields.name: Safety_Plan_Knowledge_and_or_in_place
fields.fieldText: Have you heard of a safety plan, and do you already have one in place?

fields.name: Mental_Health_Comments
fields.fieldText: How would you describe your mental health?

fields.name: Risk_Status_How_does_the_risk_compare_relative_to_other_participants_in_the_prog
fields.fieldText: Risk Status: How does the risk compare relative to other participants in the program?

fields.name: Risk_State_How_does_the_risk_compare_to_other_times_in_the_participant_s_life_wh
fields.fieldText: Risk State: How does the risk compare to other times in the participant’s life when they were at suicide risk?

fields.name: Intake_Updated_Text
fields.fieldText:
Intake Updated


The intake form has been updated. It can be viewed using the Assessments tab on the Case.


Consent reminder: written consent must be obtained and evidence uploaded to the Participant Case before the Initial Assessment can be completed.
